about_the_game:
A collaboration DLC project between "Rota's Nautical Chronicles of Trade" and Vtuber "Nekozeno Shin"!

  • The phantom thief "Nekozeno Shin" appears in the world of "Rota's Nautical Chronicles of Trade" transformed into a pixelated character!?
  • "Nekozeno Shin" will be added to the town of Portamare as a new resident character.
  • Don't miss her special lines that can only be heard here!
  • A special residence supervised by her is also available. You can only build one in the town.
  • She will also appear as a allied merchants in business negotiation. Use your skills and offensive tongue to defeat them!

*Prices have been set in accordance with the activity policy after consultation with the distributor!
detailed_description:
A collaboration DLC project between "Rota's Nautical Chronicles of Trade" and Vtuber "Nekozeno Shin"!

  • The phantom thief "Nekozeno Shin" appears in the world of "Rota's Nautical Chronicles of Trade" transformed into a pixelated character!?
  • "Nekozeno Shin" will be added to the town of Portamare as a new resident character.
  • Don't miss her special lines that can only be heard here!
  • A special residence supervised by her is also available. You can only build one in the town.
  • She will also appear as a allied merchants in business negotiation. Use your skills and offensive tongue to defeat them!

*Prices have been set in accordance with the activity policy after consultation with the distributor!
